name: Auto-Pro Luxurious Car
description: This is a car selling website named AUTOPRO. In This website you can purchase world best cars with best price.

feature.ft1: Have a dashboard where based on the user and admin role the menu will change
feature.ft2: After login or creating an account a user can place an order, manage his orders and post a review
feature.ft3: However, an admin can manage all orders, add or remove a product and make a new admin. Admin email : admin@admin.com and password: 123456
feature.ft4: User can buy a product form this site providing his/her address.
feature.ft5: Have different functionality for both user and admin
feature.ft6: User also can see his/her all order in my order page

name: Trip Today
description: A Full Stack responsive website for mobile and desktop with React. All data is loaded by MongoDB.

feature.ft1: Have a dashboard where based on the user and admin role the menu will change
feature.ft2: Users can book any service, can update a product status, and delete their own order.
feature.ft3: Google Firebase Authentication system has been added for user authentication.
feature.ft4: If user want o book our plan he/she must make an account in website. if user have already an account he/she can directly login.
feature.ft5: After booking user can see his/her booking list which user already book and user can cencel his/her booking if you want.
feature.ft6: If user book a plan it will go to pending and if admin approved this plan will be ready to go

name: Paharica Health Care
description: This a health care related website where a patient take a service and can see the doctor list

feature.ft1: This is a health care related website.
feature.ft2: Users can sign in with Google or Github as well as can register a new account.
feature.ft3: React Router made the site more dynamic.
feature.ft4: Users can see more about an article from the home page.
feature.ft5: In this website user can know about our medical and other facilitics that we are provided
feature.ft6: User can take our service easily and for this first of all you need to create an account in our site.
